definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)

sentences.english: Finally they were confirmed by DSA or MRI.
sentences.chinese: 后经DSA或MRI确诊为颈动脉海绵窦瘘。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the safety and efficacy of carotid artery stenting (CAS).
sentences.chinese: 目的评价颈动脉支架植入安全性和有效性。

sentences.english: Methods A model of rabbit carotid intimal injury was established by using air-drying method.
sentences.chinese: 方法用气体干燥术建立兔颈动脉内膜损伤模型。

sentences.english: The reduced expression of LDLR gene is responsible to carotid atherosclerosis.
sentences.chinese: LDLR表达减少参与了颈动脉粥样硬化的发病过程。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experience for performing the carotid endarterectomy on 26 patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结26例颈动脉内膜剥脱术的经验。

sentences.english: Objective To determine axis tension for rat carotid segment.
sentences.chinese: 目的测定大鼠颈动脉血管段的轴向张力。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical effect of atorvastatin on arteriosclerosis plaque of carotid artery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨阿托伐他汀对颈动脉粥样斑块的临床影响。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the stability of carotid plaque in young adult with acute cerebral infarction.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究颈动脉颅外段斑块稳定性与青中年脑梗死。

sentences.english: B-mode ultrasound was used to detect carotid artery.
sentences.chinese: 应用B型超声对颈动脉进行扫查。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the experience of caring patients having undergone cervical endarterium denudation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨颈动脉内膜剥脱术后的护理经验。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the beneficial effects of microsurgical carotid endarterectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的评估显微颈动脉内膜切除的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To determine radial tension for rat carotid segment.
sentences.chinese: 目的测定大鼠颈动脉血管段的径向张力。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the relationship between Cerebal microbleeds as well as carotid atherosclerosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脑微出血与颈动脉粥样硬化的关系。

sentences.english: Carotid artery stenosis is one of the major causes of ischemic stroke.
sentences.chinese: 颈动脉狭窄是缺血性卒中的主要病因之一。

sentences.english: The two isolated carotid sinuses of a rabbit were perfused by the method of cross-circulation.
sentences.chinese: 用交叉循环法灌流家兔两侧的隔离颈动脉窦。

sentences.english: Finally, jalandhara bandha also compresses the carotid sinuses which help in lowering the blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 最后，下颌收束也可挤压颈动脉窦，有助于降低血压。

definition: basilar artery (central artery of the brain)
